title: FS: Two (2) 1887 Old Judge Jerry Denny cards PSA graded
author: wake.up.the.echoes

posts.post_title: FS: Two (2) 1887 Old Judge Jerry Denny cards PSA graded
posts.post_content:
Harpooned my Old Judge Jerry Denny white whale and I need to load up on funds to purchase it. As a result, the following two (2) Jerry Denny PSA graded cards are for sale:

Psa 4 in jacket, arms at side
Psa 4 bat at ready at 60 degrees

[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/thebeautifulgame/oldjudge/image.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/thebeautifulgame/oldjudge/9image.jpg[/IMG]

[url]http://www.imageevent.com/thebeautifulgame/oldjudge[/url].  Direct link in case scans don't show in post. IPAD always gives me trouble. Anyway, $200 each. Postage $5.
If you buy both, they are yours for $380, shipping included. Payment via paypal (immediately if you can, as I am anxious to make a purchase). I will ship tomorrow.

Taking offers via PM as well, in case you wanted to give it a shot! Alan

PM if interested.

Alan
